hero.title: How Fanora Works
hero.subtitle: Getting your personalized celebrity video is a breeze! Follow these simple steps to connect.

stepsSection.title: Get Started in 3 Easy Steps
stepsSection.subtitle: Fanora makes it simple to connect with your favorite Pakistani influencers. Follow these steps to request a personalized video or interaction.

steps.title: 1. Find Your Star
steps.description: Explore our diverse catalog of Pakistani celebrities. Use the search or browse by categories like actors, singers, cricketers, and more. Each profile provides details, sample work, and pricing in PKR.

steps.title: 2. Request Your Video
steps.description: Once you've found your star, click "Request." Fill in the details: who it's for, the occasion, and any specific instructions for the message. Make it personal! Then, complete the secure payment.

steps.title: 3. Receive & Share!
steps.description: The star records your personalized video. We'll email you a link to download it once ready (check profiles for estimated delivery times). Share the joy and create lasting memories!

tips.title: Be Specific
tips.description: The more details you provide (names, inside jokes, specific phrases, the occasion), the more personal and special the video will be. However, keep it concise and clear.

tips.title: Check Pronunciations
tips.description: If there are tricky names or words, consider providing phonetic spellings or a short audio clip if the platform allows, to help the star get it right.

tips.title: Keep it Positive & Respectful
tips.description: Stars are happy to create joyful and uplifting messages. Ensure your request is appropriate and aligns with a positive experience for everyone.

tips.title: Allow Time
tips.description: Celebrities have busy schedules. While they aim to complete requests promptly, check their profile for estimated delivery times and book in advance for time-sensitive occasions.
